content.text:
# Draft:Phaya Phap's Rebellion

'''Phaya Phap's Rebellion''' (), took place between September 1889 and March 1890. It started when the supporter of Phaya Phap, a former commander of Chiang Mai Army, planned to attack Chiang Mai and kill Siamese officials in the city. The rebeliion was put down by Siamese goverment in 1890.
